CustomField.formula: IF( AND(OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Finalised')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Cancelled'))), OR(animalos__Latest_Recheck_Date__c <= TODAY(), ISPICKVAL(animalos__Priority__c, 'Critical'))), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/red.png","RED", 30, -1), IF( AND(OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Finalised')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Cancelled'))), ISPICKVAL( Future_Action_Required__c, 'Awaiting Reply' )), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/orange.png","ORANGE", 30, -1), IF( AND(OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Finalised')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(animalos__Status__c, 'Cancelled'))), ISPICKVAL( Future_Action_Required__c, 'Phone Call' )), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/grey.png","GREY", 30, -1), IMAGE("/resource/animalos__indicatorIcons/green.png","GREEN", 30, -1) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Action Flag
